name: INTERNATIONAL TEN RATER

images.alt: International Ten Rater drawing on sailboatdata.com

notes:
RC Model Yacht.
Basic dimensions are estimates/average as this a development class using the 'length and sail area rating rule' developed for full size yachts in 1887. (A most recent use of the rule is the 5.5 METER CLASS.)

Many different hull forms can be found in the TEN RATER class. The latest versions will usually be made almost entirely of carbon fibre - hull, foils, spars and fittings.
